channel.title: How to delete a fixed menu! Please help! - Compilcated-
channel.description:
Ok then! So ive made a jail, and gota nice teleblock on it so no1 can teleport out! YAY Now theres one problem and thats the commands! What i am doing is changing all teleport commands to emotes (somehow lol!) so what i need is a code to get rid of the Player Controlls menu when a player is standing in certain coords, so they cant use the emotes! Ive heard it can be done but i cannot for the life of me find out how! so if anyone knows how, or knows anyone who might no how you would be helping me tons!
Thanks alot![br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 08:05:49 AM[/size][hr]please reply!

item.title: How to delete a fixed menu! Please help! - Compilcated-

@the_cow_slay wrote:

lol yeh i know that, but i didnt want to quote it out, i just wanted it not to be there if a player stands in certain co-ords, lol im not that thick!

thanx anyway lol

item.description:

just in case you need it, this is how you quote a piece of code out.

thisIsAnUnquotedPieceOfCode();

//thisIsaSingleQuote();

/*ThisIsHowYou();
QuoteMultipleThingsOr();
QuoteInTheMiddleOfACode();
*/

item.title: How to delete a fixed menu! Please help! - Compilcated-
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

see my tut with teleblocks on emotes?

here

example:

case 168: // yes emote if(!teleblock) { setAnimation(715); teleportToX = 2539; teleportToY = 4719; } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } break;

hope i helped

item.dc:creator: @the_cow_slay the cow slay
item.description:
@the_cow_slay wrote:

well im currently using a void:

public void Jailed() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); if (isInJail()) { teleblock = true; } }
a boolean:

public boolean isInJail() { if((absX >= 2958 && 2978 <=2978 && absY >= 3326 && absY <= 3341 ) && heightLevel == 1) return true; return false; }
and added

				Jailed();

to case 121 and i can use emotes to teleâ€¦
